replies.msg:
完整log唔貼啦都係正正常常咁apt update同upgrade
過程冇出error同埋冇config conflict問我改唔改

以前用佢啲「官方」OS已經試過upgrade完boot唔到
之後用Armbian upgrade咗幾次都事以為ok
點知今次又奶野
點解我用呢部OPi次次都要衰喺apt手上

部RPi用Raspbian就點玩都未出過事

The following packages will be upgraded:
armbian-firmware armbian-tools-jessie base-files bash bind9-host

After this operation, 624 kB of additional disk space will be used.

MAC轉咗搞到派咗另一粒IP SSH入唔到
(我全部device都係手動set ip)
原本我以為係死咗但係見到LAN燈有閃
入router睇一睇


原本個address
唔識答 幫你推下

see if this post helps you
https://forum.armbian.com/index.php/topic/1738-opi-lite-mac-address/

see if this post helps you
https://forum.armbian.com/index.php/topic/1738-opi-lite-mac-address/

我最後喺 /etc/network/interfaces 用 hwaddress ether 搞掂咗
不過都係唔明最初個問題點解會出現
